netsquid\.protocols
===================

Protocols are *virtual* entities (:py:obj:`~pydynaa.core.Entity`) that manipulate components (:py:obj:`~netsquid.components.component.Component`).
Protocols derive from a :py:obj:`~netsquid.protocols.protocol.Protocol` base class and are initialised with the node(s) they need to operate with.

The protocol classes make use of inheritance.

.. .. image:: _static/protocols.png
..     :align: center

.. toctree::
    :caption: Modules
    :maxdepth: 2

    api_protocols/netsquid.protocols.protocol
    api_protocols/netsquid.protocols.nodeprotocols
    api_protocols/netsquid.protocols.serviceprotocol
